works.title: Bakery landing page
works.description: A delightful, responsive bakery website showcasing artisanal bread and pastries. Built with clean HTML5 and modern CSS3, featuring an elegant design with smooth animations and a mouth-watering gallery of baked goods.

works.title: DevFolio landing page
works.description: A sleek, professional portfolio template designed for developers and designers. This responsive landing page features a modern layout, clean typography, and smooth scrolling navigation, all crafted with semantic HTML5 and CSS3.

works.title: Daniels landing page
works.description: An elegant portfolio website with a minimalist design, focusing on typography and whitespace. Built as an exam project, it demonstrates strong layout skills and attention to detail using modern web standards.

works.title: Fokir landing page
works.description: A clean, modern portfolio template with smooth scrolling and interactive elements. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices. The project showcases a perfect blend of creativity and functionality.

works.title: Login System
works.description: A secure and responsive authentication system with clean UI/UX design. Features include user registration, login, password recovery, and form validation. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript, ensuring fast performance and cross-browser compatibility. The system includes client-side validation and smooth error handling for a seamless user experience.

works.title: Bookmark landing page
works.description: A sleek, user-friendly bookmark manager interface with a clean design and intuitive navigation. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript, this project features tabbed navigation, FAQ accordion, and a responsive layout that adapts to all screen sizes. Perfect for showcasing UI/UX design skills.

works.title: Crud System landing page
works.description: A dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application with a clean, intuitive interface. Built with modern JavaScript, this system allows users to manage data entries efficiently. Features include form validation, real-time updates, and responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.

works.title: Mealify Landing Page
works.description: A modern restaurant website with an elegant design and smooth animations. Features include an interactive menu with filtering options, online reservation system, and a mouth-watering food gallery. Built with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript, this fully responsive template ensures a perfect viewing experience across all devices.

works.title: Weather forecast page for three days or less
works.description: A dynamic weather application that provides accurate 3-day forecasts with a clean, intuitive interface. Features real-time weather data, responsive design, and a beautiful UI that adapts to different weather conditions. Built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

works.title: CSS Grid Masterclass
works.description: An educational project showcasing the power of CSS Grid for creating complex, responsive layouts. Features multiple grid-based design patterns, from simple card layouts to advanced masonry and magazine-style designs. Includes interactive examples and code snippets to help developers master modern CSS layout techniques.

works.title: Inspirational Quote Generator
works.description: A beautiful web application that generates random inspirational quotes with the click of a button. Features include the ability to share quotes on social media, copy to clipboard, and a clean, minimalist design. Built with vanilla JavaScript, this project demonstrates API integration and DOM manipulation skills while providing daily motivation to users.

works.title: Foodie's Paradise
works.description: A vibrant food discovery platform that helps users find and explore delicious recipes. Features include recipe search by ingredients, category filtering, and detailed cooking instructions. The responsive design ensures a seamless experience across devices, with beautiful food photography and an intuitive user interface built with modern web technologies.

works.title: LinkedPost - Social Media Platform
works.description: A full-stack social media application inspired by LinkedIn, built with Next.js and modern web technologies. Features include user profiles, post creation, likes, comments, and real-time updates. The platform offers a clean, professional interface with responsive design, ensuring optimal performance across all devices.

works.title: Needful - E-commerce Platform
works.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring a modern, user-friendly interface. Key features include product catalog with filtering, shopping cart, secure checkout process, and order tracking. The platform is optimized for performance with server-side rendering, ensuring fast loading times and excellent SEO. Built with a mobile-first approach for seamless shopping across all devices.
